description: Describes all trust stores for the specified account.

parameters.name: TrustStoreArns
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the trust store. (string) ---

parameters.name: Names
parameters.description: The names of the trust stores. (string) ---

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the trust store.

nested_items.name: TrustStoreArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the trust store.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status of the trust store.

nested_items.name: NumberOfCaCertificates
nested_items.description: The number of ca certificates in the trust store.

nested_items.name: TotalRevokedEntries
nested_items.description: The number of revoked certificates in the trust store.

nested_items.name: NextMarker
nested_items.description: If there are additional results, this is the marker for the next set of results. Otherwise, this is null.
